trans-unit.source: How to: Manage the Access Control Namespace for a Service Bus
trans-unit.target: How to: Manage the Access Control Namespace for a Service Bus

trans-unit.source: When you create a Service Bus namespace in the <token>portal</token>, the portal automatically creates an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for the service bus.
trans-unit.target: When you create a Service Bus namespace in the <token>portal</token>, the portal automatically creates an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for the service bus.

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to open the <token>secondref_acs</token> management portal to the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for a service bus so you can configure and manage it.
trans-unit.target: This topic explains how to open the <token>secondref_acs</token> management portal to the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for a service bus so you can configure and manage it.

trans-unit.source: To manage the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for a service bus
trans-unit.target: To manage the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for a service bus

trans-unit.source: Click <ui>Service Bus</ui> and then select a service bus.
trans-unit.target: Click <ui>Service Bus</ui> and then select a service bus.

trans-unit.source: Click <ui>Connection Information</ui> and then click <ui>Open ACS Management Portal</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Click <ui>Connection Information</ui> and then click <ui>Open ACS Management Portal</ui>.

trans-unit.source: You can now use the <token>secondref_acs</token> management portal to configure and manage the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for the service bus.
trans-unit.target: You can now use the <token>secondref_acs</token> management portal to configure and manage the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for the service bus.

trans-unit.source: To verify that the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> is associated with the service bus, see the <ui>Service Namespace</ui> field at the top of the <ui>Access Control Service</ui> page.
trans-unit.target: To verify that the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> is associated with the service bus, see the <ui>Service Namespace</ui> field at the top of the <ui>Access Control Service</ui> page.

trans-unit.source: The namespace name consists of the service bus namespace name with an "-sb" suffix.
trans-unit.target: The namespace name consists of the service bus namespace name with an "-sb" suffix.

trans-unit.source: For more information about configuring the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for a service bus, see <link xlink:href="20163576-85ca-4532-a391-6030a4549973" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Developing Applications that Use Service Bus</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Federated Authentication for Azure Service Bus</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj136813.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj136813.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information about configuring the <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for a service bus, see <link xlink:href="20163576-85ca-4532-a391-6030a4549973" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Developing Applications that Use Service Bus</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Federated Authentication for Azure Service Bus</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj136813.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj136813.aspx).

trans-unit.source: When you add a Service Bus relying party application to a managed namespace, such as a Service Bus namespace, do not enter application-specific (dedicated) certificates or keys.
trans-unit.target: When you add a Service Bus relying party application to a managed namespace, such as a Service Bus namespace, do not enter application-specific (dedicated) certificates or keys.

trans-unit.source: Instead, select the options that direct ACS to use the certificates and keys that are configured for all applications in the managed namespace.
trans-unit.target: Instead, select the options that direct ACS to use the certificates and keys that are configured for all applications in the managed namespace.

trans-unit.source: For relying party applications that are not managed by Microsoft, you must create and manage application-specific (dedicated) keys.
trans-unit.target: For relying party applications that are not managed by Microsoft, you must create and manage application-specific (dedicated) keys.
